skill.name: constitutional-writer
skill.description: Extracts and writes project constitutional information from documents (PDF, MD, TXT). Focuses exclusively on identifying principles, values, governance structures, and formatting them into a proper project constitution.
skill.summary: Extracts and writes project constitutional information from documents (PDF, MD, TXT). Focuses exclus...
skill.author: Azeem-2

security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill for document analysis with a benign Python utility script. The script reads user-specified files and outputs to stdout with no network access, external commands, or credential access.

content.value_statement: Projects often contain scattered principles and values across multiple documents. This skill automatically extracts constitutional elements like mission, vision, values, and governance structures from any document and formats them into a standardized project constitution.
actual_capabilities: Extract mission statements and purpose from documents
Identify core values and guiding principles
Capture vision statements and long-term aspirations
Recognize governance structures and decision processes
Format extracted content into standardized constitution templates
limitations: Does not analyze or critique documents, only extracts content
Does not create new content beyond formatting extracted text
Requires source documents to contain constitutional elements

use_cases.title: Create Project Charters
use_cases.description: Generate a project constitution from existing charter documents and meeting notes.

use_cases.title: Document Company Values
use_cases.description: Extract and formalize company values from founding documents and communication.

use_cases.title: Standardize Team Principles
use_cases.description: Build a team constitution from existing documentation and policy files.

prompt_templates.title: Basic Extraction
prompt_templates.prompt: Use the constitutional-writer skill to extract the constitution from this document.

prompt_templates.title: Multi-Document
prompt_templates.prompt: Use constitutional-writer to create a constitution from these combined documents.

prompt_templates.title: Template Based
prompt_templates.prompt: Apply the constitution-template.md to format extracted content properly.

prompt_templates.title: Framework Guide
prompt_templates.prompt: Use constitutional-frameworks.md to identify all constitutional elements in this document.

output_examples.input: Extract the constitution from this project charter document
output: Generated constitution with Mission, Vision, Values, Governance, and Quality Standards sections
Each section contains bullet points extracted verbatim from source document

best_practices: Provide complete source documents for best extraction results
Review extracted content for completeness before use
Use the template to ensure consistent formatting across constitutions
anti_patterns: Do not provide documents without constitutional content and expect meaningful output
Do not assume the skill will invent principles not present in source documents
Do not expect analysis or critique of extracted content

faq.question: What document formats are supported?
faq.answer: MD, TXT, PDF, DOCX, and XLSX formats are supported through built-in skills.

faq.question: Can I export the constitution?
faq.answer: Yes, the output is plain markdown text that can be copied to any document or file.

faq.question: Does this work with all AI tools?
faq.answer: The skill is compatible with Claude, Codex, and Claude Code tools.

faq.question: Is my data safe?
faq.answer: Yes, all processing happens locally through the AI tool environment.

faq.question: Can it handle multiple languages?
faq.answer: The skill works best with English but can process any language text.

faq.question: What if my document has no constitution?
faq.answer: The skill will return an empty constitution with a note that no elements were found.
